azurerm_app_service_plan.description: Manages an App Service Plan component.

name.description: Specifies the name of the App Service Plan component. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the App Service Plan component.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

kind.description: The kind of the App Service Plan to create. Possible values are `Windows` (also available as `App`), `Linux`, `elastic` (for Premium Consumption

app_service_environment_id.description: The ID of the App Service Environment where the App Service Plan should be located. Changing forces a new resource to be created.

reserved.description: Is this App Service Plan `Reserved`. Defaults to `false`.

per_site_scaling.description: Can Apps assigned to this App Service Plan be scaled independently? If set to `false` apps assigned to this plan will scale to all instances of the plan.  Defaults to `false`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

capacity.description: Specifies the number of workers associated with this App Service Plan.

id.description: The ID of the App Service Plan component.

maximum_number_of_workers.description: The maximum number of workers supported with the App Service Plan's sku.

create.description: Used when creating the App Service Plan.

update.description: Used when updating the App Service Plan.

read.description: Used when retrieving the App Service Plan.

delete.description: Used when deleting the App Service Plan.
